Thank for bringing that to my attention. If that's available, I'll use it to implement HalfNormal (and might refactor that as a special case of a FoldedNormal in a different PR).

As an aside, the docs state that bijectors implement bijective differentiable transforms, but the absolute value function is not a bijection. Am I right in guessing bijectors is moving towards being a more general set of transforms for distributions?
